website_summaries.verdict: As far as organic tampons go, these are among the best. Pricey, but worth considering if you're sensitive to chemicals or simply prefer an eco-friendly option.
pros: Free from perfumes, chlorine, and other chemicals
Some users experience a reduction in cramping and headaches
Biodegradable cardboard applicators are environmentally friendly
cons: Applicator use is inconsistent, with some providing effortless insertion while a few may not glide as easily

customer_reviews.title: CHRONIC MALFUNCTION IS UNACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.text: As multiple other reviewers have stated, the applicators are definitely an issue!! Oddly, they inconsistently malfunction, approximately one half of them just don't glide. I used cardboard applicators in mainstream tampons and never had this issue. This company really needs to fix this quite frustrating problem!! I gave them 3 stars because they ARE organic and therefore I am not putting pesticide soaked cotton in my body. But Natracare is NO LONGER the only game in town and I would seriously recommend looking elsewhere. LOLA is the brand I use now. Don't know how this old review magically changed the one star I gave to 3 stars. THIS IS A ONE STAR PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerine

customer_reviews.title: i figured it out and it's my go to tampons
customer_reviews.text: this product works but a little hard to use. to use with minimal mess, the trick is to spin the back handle to make it loose and have a good grip on the front piece and do not let go or it'll get slippery. i would recommend for people that have good backs because you'll need to be bent over a little longer since it's made out of paper. give it a try and see if it's something you can handle.
customer_reviews.author: san francisco

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Free!! Fully biodegradable and Organic
customer_reviews.text: I love these when not using silicone menstrual cup by mcuk. Unlike most other organic tampons these have cardboard applicators (not plastic) so they’re completely biodegradable. Compared to other organic tampons they’re actually absorbable where others even in super don’t absorb as well and can cause leaks early. Because they’re organic they lessen cramping as well, for years i thought it was my body’s fault for horrible incapacitating cramps, even after switching to a plant based diet (which cut them in half) i’d still get them but switching to organic tampons or the mcuk they’ve gone down to nothing on light days and manageable on heavy days.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great if you liked old-style Tampax
customer_reviews.text: Did you like the old long/narrow Tampax, before their redesign (which must've happened 10+ years ago now)? These are the only tampons that live up to them. They absorb a lot, and never leak unless they're *really* pushed beyond their capacity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
customer_reviews.author: riverrat01

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and non-irritating.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the Tampax I was using because these dont irritate the skin, body. But they are not leak proof. They seem to absorb better than store brand because there is no rayon fiber and other things mixed in. So if you have sensitive skin or body these are good and the cardboard applicator doesn't scratch. Just one trick is to push the outer tube in a little before inserting to keep it from getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann S.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was horrible, but these are my fav tampons
customer_reviews.text: These tampons are my favorite as I prefer the cardboard applicator as its earth friendly! Unfortunately there came almost smashed and un-useable. I was able to make the majority work and needed them so didnt have time to return but they could send it in a box not an envelope to prevent this issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: KaraJane91

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to insert!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to insert, have been struggling in public bathooms all day with these and making a mess. Had to discard one because it wouldn't go in. Otherwise they're fine. Improve the applicator! Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DSK

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable leaky tampons
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brands no-applicator tampons for years. I wanted to try the ones with applicators since I'm getting older and I'm less flexible. I am incredibly disappointed. The tampon in the applicator is not the same tampon that your brand uses for the no-applicator package. Why would you not just use the same tampon? The ones with no-applicator are shorter, more comfortable, and open like an umbrella as it absorbs so as to prevent leaks. The tampons in the applicators are so long they are super uncomfortable and are rolled like a cheap joint so that they leak everytime. I'm returning the unused boxes I have and will not ever buy these applicator tampons again.
customer_reviews.author: scott McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: It's gotten a bit better but they're more difficult that some other brands with ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I appreciate the plastic free and natural, but I found them tricky to use. It's gotten a bit better but they're more difficult that some other brands with cardboard applicators. I'm going to search around for another option before I would reorder these.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use regular tampons that you can get from the store. Pretty sure every time I do I get some form of toxic shock syndrome. Because of that I switched to organic tampons. I’ve been using these for quite some time and these are perfect. I hate cardboard applicators, but I’d rather do that because there is too much plastic waste these days. I recommend these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Healthier option - tricky at first, but worth the premium - used with PCOS
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to learn how to use, as others have suggested. You'll just have to learn how to reposition to make use easiest for you. They do the job, and I LOVE not having all those nasty chemicals involved. Worth the premium over cheapies in my opinion... even though I do miss their easy use applicators! I am diagnosed with PCOS, so I am now extra careful in what I eat and insert in my body or apply since my hormones are already out of whack. These are worth it and I feel it's a healthier choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: NomadicShopperTX

customer_reviews.title: As much as I wanted to love these, they didn't work out for me
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to love these, they didn't work out for me. Trying to insert these is a joke. Most of the tampons simply do not want to come out of the applicator. I had to take lost of them out of the applicator and insert them myself. For the price point of these, it should be a much better design.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Try these
customer_reviews.text: I can't use conventional cotton tampons with chlorine bleach, so I only use these. I no longer get stomach pains and nausea and adverse effects from tampons once I switched to these.
customer_reviews.author: Marlu

customer_reviews.title: My favourite brand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, flushable applicator, cotton with no nasties. I get the regular but honestly could get the light. Good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have yet to find a good organic tampon
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to find a good organic tampon. These are uncomfortable, too big and the applicator is faulty. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price ( for the quality)
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product, and so much cheaper than WholeFoods. Notice that the packages with 16 tampons have applicators and the packs with 20 tampons do not.
customer_reviews.author: American Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best tampons I have ever used! I love that they are toxin free and organic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's natural but the applicator is horrible it gets stuck without me even trying to use it. I now have two boxes of these that I won't use unless it's an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: tennille hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. As easy to use as any other tampon but so much less unhealthy and damaging. Nicely packaged and really easy to use. Not sure what the other reviews are referring to.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia G

customer_reviews.title: Organic tampons don’t make periods suck any less
customer_reviews.text: I mean... they’re tampons. They do exactly what they are supposed to. The good thing about these organic ones is that they lack the bleached and treated cotton that can cause reactions in certain people (like myself).
customer_reviews.author: Maia V

customer_reviews.title: I like knowing I have cotton down there and not the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing I have cotton down there and not the yicky mystery stuff, but I do wish they were just a little more absorbent. I do leak just a little in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons, since I have switched to chlorine free tampons I have noticed that my cramps have lessened and my flow is not as heavy. Coincidence?? Probably not. I have never had any leak problems with this brand either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Organic tampons, yes, cardboard applicator, yes and at this price for three packs its a great value
customer_reviews.author: Michelle LeFever

customer_reviews.title: These tampons are comfortable to use and do their job without the harmful ...
customer_reviews.text: These tampons are comfortable to use and do their job without the harmful chemicals used in the big brand companies. The cardboard applocator is user friendly. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are all natural
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are all natural! They are made well and don't fall apart (This has happened before with another brand!) They are actually absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Organic and Healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these..they are healthy and organic. it feels great to know that you are inserting something healthy not something that is a risk to your body. In my experience, it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Laugh Nd Love

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them for one cycle so far, but they worked well, no problems. I'm not a fan of cardboard applicators, plastic is more convenient, but I guess the whole point is to be more "green" so I'm going to make the compromise.
customer_reviews.author: noky64

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work like tampons did a long time ago, actually absorbent and SAFE, and affordable!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Best price and product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a variety of period products and found these to be the most comfortable and easy to use. Be prepared to wait on shipping but it’s worth the wait and the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to traditional, bleached tampons. They work like all the regular brands, but I feel they are somehow a better choice for something I'm putting in my body. If you're an organic, natural, anti-chemical freak like me then this is the product for you! Their pads are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: ... paper applicator so when trying to insert it’s not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Product is paper applicator so when trying to insert it’s not comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Linder

customer_reviews.title: Good organic tampons
customer_reviews.text: These are good tampons and they're organic. Never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. Unfortunately, they were very uncomfortable (too long). Also, sometimes the applicator didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: SqueakysMom

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for applicator. Tended to pinch. Absorbs fine but won't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use them
customer_reviews.text: I cant get the tampon to come out of the applicator...HUGE waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: abby brusco

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to bad effects of chlorine
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a bit less absorbant than leading brands, and I sometimes have issues with the cardboard applicator, but overall these are much healthier for you ( and the environment) I will take that trade off anyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are all natural
customer_reviews.text: I buy a year's worth of these at once. Love that they are all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Kisch

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they would be a good all day solution
customer_reviews.text: I only use them when I swim, not for long periods of time. Not sure if they would be a good all day solution. I was more concerned with having an all organic cotton product and this works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: O Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and nontoxic!
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch to all natural, nontoxic feminine products, and these tampons got it right. They are comfortable to wear, easy to remove, and affordable. Will purchase, again and again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best. Comfortable, no frills, and what's the point of buying organic food and not organic tampons?? You're literally putting this in your body. I will never buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I've tried both Natracare brand tampons, applicator and no applicator, they are both excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jennyinkeller

customer_reviews.title: organic cotton
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using organic cotton. Women shouldn't be putting anything with pesticides, perfumes and dyes into their bodies. It's my understanding that tampons which are not organic can potentially cause endometriosis. I'm not a doctor but it makes sense to only use organic cotton
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite of the various natural, organic brands. They fit well and don't cause any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to use this product. Toxin and chemical free is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: itriedit

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Virtually impossible to get the applicator to work. Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great product and works like they are suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDixon

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and allergies
customer_reviews.text: My wife has severe skin allergies including an allergy to whatever is used to process most tampons. These seem to resolve most of the issues.
customer_reviews.author: TimCO

customer_reviews.title: I love these are great for women with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love these are great for women with sensitive skin ! They arrived on time, which is great! The only thing I dislike is sometimes the cotton gets stuck in the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I like this organic brand
customer_reviews.text: I like this organic brand. I originally purchased it at Whole Foods, but recently I was only to find Super in the stores and I preferred the Regular size. The cost of ordering this product on-line was comparable to what I would have paid in the store, and now I have the product I really want. Good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Schuttenberg

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and even easier to use than traditional tampons. It's a relief to know that I have natural tampons.
customer_reviews.author: J-Blah

customer_reviews.title: ... hard to deal with but other than that I like
customer_reviews.text: applicator sometimes is hard to deal with but other than that I like them
customer_reviews.author: Ljm

customer_reviews.title: Best organic tampoon!
customer_reviews.text: If you are deciding to choose any brand, I highly recommend these. I do have light periods but I would never go back to using the normal store brand tampoons. If you choose not to buy these, definitely buy another organic brand. Hope this helps! (:
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Better price than store when you buy in bulk. All natural
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ann Hosey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are cotton, no dyes or added material. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Just as easy to use and absorbent as other brands on market ...
customer_reviews.text: No difference from other brands! Just as easy to use and absorbent as other brands on market but made better for you and the environment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One hundred percent of all my fiancée's prefer these tampons.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY switched to natural tampons at age 37. I will never go back! These are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie1014

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. This is what we always use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first batch I got worked just fine. The second batch were harder use. hard to insert. doesn't absorb as well as other over the counter brands but i like the fact they are organic.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my daughter -- she loves the all natural cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I can't even tell they're there half of the time. Insertion takes some getting used to, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ayannah

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use less tampons now that I use these, vs using Tampax. (strange but cool) These are very long, not like the conventional tampons. So if you have a tilted uterus you may feel some discomfort, but you'll get used to placement so it's more comfortable. I've used the regular and super of these and love love love them. .
customer_reviews.author: Flora Sage

customer_reviews.title: Don't let big companies such as PandG products fool you!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, these are the best tampons I have used. I have tried every brand in the supermarkets, but never satisfied. These have no issues at all, and most importantly, no chemicals!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tampons ever! I feel sick and cramp up with synthetic tampons but these are so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel good to provide a more clean option for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who just started menstruating. She has had no issue at all. Makes me feel good to provide a more clean option for her
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The best Organic Tampon I've found on the market - use less and save yourself from all those toxic chemicals!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Best organic ones out there!!!! Comfortable inserting and fit. Finally!!
customer_reviews.author: TLJ

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about these tampons. I switched to Natracare seeing that they were organic and not made with crap like the other tampons are made with after having a toxic shock scare. The applicator sucks. You have to push out the tampon a little prior to inserting it. Also expect to leak if a normal day turns a little heavier unexpectedly. This is definitely the most annoying for me because when working out. If you can get past those two qualms, purchase them. They are natural, you can't feel them and don't damage the environment or your body. Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Norman

customer_reviews.title: Find a better option - Save your miney!
customer_reviews.text: The applicators one these do not work AT ALL! I made a mistake, and thought I ordered the applicator free ones. The actual tampons also cause frequent and heavy leaking. This product is really bad quality. Unfortunately I am stuck with two and 3/4 boxes of unusable, inferior quality tampons.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are organic but the cardboard tube can be very hard to move when trying to insert.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I've found them
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found these organic tampons. They are super absorbent, more so than the typical ones- one literally lasted me one day when I ran out of them & had to wait until I got home to find the delivery. Not recommend pushing that far though;) I also like Natracare panty lines. I feel so much better that they don't contain bleaches and other undesirable ingredients typical of the regular tampons & pads.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very important to use non bleached tampons! For obvious health reasons, anything you put in your body should be as natural & organic as possible.. Very worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 packs of the 16, regular with applicator. Received the product in two days as promised with the shipping option I chose, literally just in time for my menses. It was packed well, no damage upon receipt and all three boxes were shrink wrapped together, unopened. I like this brand better than the Organyc brand, the applicator seems more sturdy in my opinion which eases use. They do the job, nothing more I can say besides please, if you're gonna use a tampon, make sure they are made from organic cotton!!! Don't stick chemically treated cotton up your vag :-( lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Non chlorinated will not cause TSS like bleached tampons
customer_reviews.text: Non chlorinated will not cause TSS like bleached tampons. Applicator is smooth and works well. Wish more brick and mortar stores carried not bleached tampons.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love organic, tampons
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love organic, tampons. Whats to say, they do what the are supposed to do, without the chemicals in there of pesticide
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered more of this product. I'm really moving to a more healthy life style without all the chemicals and using this product makes me feel like I'm not poisoning my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: tampons work great my only issue is the applicator
customer_reviews.text: tampons work great , I have long nails and is a little hard to use. But overall it works great and the most important fact is save for my body.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong item... wanted ones without applicator ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered wrong item...wanted ones without applicator. Still gonna use them though.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: Three stars for organic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted organic tampons. So three stars are for that. However, I feel like the cardboard applicator should be redesigned to slide more easily. I don’t want to struggle with my tampon. I also felt that these tampons were hard and as a result I could feel them when other tampons I have used are not noticeable once inserted. I also found they were not as absorbent as they could be and unfortunate leaks occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I decided to buy these and I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to live a more "organic" lifestyle when it comes to what I'm putting in and on my body. I decided to buy these and I love them!!!! I feel better knowing that I'm not putting toxins in places where toxins shouldn't be. However, the applicator on this is so lame and annoying!!!! I miss the ease of a plastic applicator, and even some cardboard tampons have applicators that just slide smoothly but these need to be fixed. That's the only reason I gave them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Comparing applicator to non-applicator tampons
customer_reviews.text: One thing I don't like about these tampons is that the applicator is tricky to use- if you stick it in too far it gets wet and then you don't have enough grip on the sides to push the applicator or plunge the tampon inside. Super frustrating! Also this type of tampon is longer compared to the non-applicator tampons (don't know why) which means you have to push it even farther inside. This type of tampon also has a higher absorbency for the "regular" absorbency level (probably because they're bigger than their non-applicator counterparts)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these tampons
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons; I’ve been using them for years. It’s very easy to overcome the applicator malfunction - before using it, push the tampon through the top of the applicator. Push it back down. Repeat 2-3 more times until it’s glidjng smoothly. It’s not difficult or time consuming. Not a reason to not use this great product.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: GO ORGANIC
customer_reviews.text: These are so good to use since they are orgainic. My daughter will only order these. Just make sure when ordering that you are purchasing these with an applicator. I've made a mistake before and have ordered some that don't have an applicator. Not a great mistake to make.
customer_reviews.author: aloha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, comfortable, and organic!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Natracare regular tampons with applicators for years. I have tried other organic tampon companies but these are by far my favorites. They are easy to use and I don't feel them throughout the day. For heavier days I use the super absorbent and they are equally as great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! My wife says she hasn’t had any leakage. She did say that she feels like she ends up changing them more often than other brands. But she’s rather have these since they contain less chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bad batch? But still will buy again
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this type of tampon. The application process was troubling at times as the applicator couldn't glide smooth and quick. but I figured a way to adjust each one before insertion and was just fine. Second purchase I noticed the applicators didn't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good given limited convenient options
customer_reviews.text: It seems that all-cotton options available for delivery are few and far between, and I haven't found any sold in stores within walking distance of my condo. These have worked well for me; though I consider them a bit pricey, after reading the recent surge of horror stories and statistics about TSS, I have made an effort to use only organic cotton tampons. Ladies with heavy flow may not find the "regulars" adequate for even a few hours; I would assume the supers are significantly more absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: They’re horrible. They delivered a defective batch. The cotton isn’t completely inside the applicator. It’s so painful to put in. Biggest waste of money. I had to throw them out. Will never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job, however I was not able to properly insert so many of them without it breaking in two! Super flimsy packaging and not worth the hassle. Very cheaply made. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: St.

customer_reviews.title: some are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Applicators are inconsistent, some are easy to use, others impossible. Would not buy again. They were indeed absorbant and leak-free though, more so than oher "natural" types.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product is great! I'm not sure if this is valid but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had difficulty with the applicator but I prefer a cardboard applicator as opposed to plastic. I also have not experienced the trouble others have reported with inconsistent applicators. Regardless, this product is great! I'm not sure if this is valid but I swear I use less tampons. My first purchase of 3 boxes was in June 2017 and my second was February 2018. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Applicator is awful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many tampons I wasted dropping them onto the floor of the bathroom because I couldn't get the applicator to cooperate. It is basically nonfunctional. It doesn't push the tampon out of itself, which is its only reason for existence. Every way I manipulated the applicator to get it to work failed -- rotating it, squeezing it, pushing the tampon out a bit, etc. It's just a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Applicator sucks, however....
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the occasional frustration because they're so much better for your body. As other reviewers have said, sometimes these applicators don't work. And I for one HATE non-applicator tampons- they disgust me. 1 out of 2 or 3 of these have given me problems, but I deal with it anyway because the absorbency is good, and they're better for my body than the pesticide-filled leading brands.
customer_reviews.author: mrstessabee

customer_reviews.title: I did not like these at all
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these at all. They are difficult to get in with the cardboard applicator. They are also quite a bit longer than normal tampons and this made it extremely uncomfortable to wear. I could feel it the whole time. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and think it’s a quality organic item. The dispenser is easier to use and doesn’t get stuck like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 boxes!
customer_reviews.text: So much for three boxes. I got one box only. I paid over $15 to get one box of 16 tampons. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Philips

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: They aren't very absorbent. Outside of the cotton roll will absorb, inside does not so it leaks sooner than it should
customer_reviews.author: Muffin Man

customer_reviews.title: These are good. Cardboard applicators can be hard to use
customer_reviews.text: These are good. Cardboard applicators can be hard to use, but these are no worse than any others. I love that these are organic cotton- regular tampons and leave me with irritation, but these are great. Hard to find in stores, so nice to order easily with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great tampons. I’m Very sensitive & seem to get yeast infections easily. These have definitely helped with that issue. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kikers

customer_reviews.title: Wish the applicator slid better
customer_reviews.text: The only tampons I use. A little difficult to get used to the applicator as it is cardboard and doesn't slide very easily. I recommend two hands, one for holding one for pushing the applicator. Otherwise a fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

product_meta.description: Package Quantity:3NATRACARE Organic Regular Tampons with Applicator ,16 Count (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: Completely chemical, perfume, and chlorine free
